# ðŸ¦Œ The Anison Stack

**ðŸ¦Œ The Anison Stack** is a monorepo starter with mainly React, Remix, and Tailwind CSS. The goal is to be as productive as possible, ship things fast, and scale the project easily. So it is a highly opinionated collection of software engineering and web development workflow, project structure, interactive UI components, functionality hooks and utilities.

Visit [anison.haidar.dev](https://anison.haidar.dev)
